title: I NEED A GOOD SUPPORT TO DUO WITH SO I CAN GET OUT OF BRONZE
body:
I need a good support cos in all my ranked games i lose cos of crappy supports
i ma a good adc and i really want a silver or gold border if i can 
pls if u r a good support main send me an invite and get me out of bronze

replies.body: hey wanna know somehting my win rate on twitch is now 40% and i found a support main and im climbing out of bronze!

I main threhs and wont to play with u since i herd ur a good adc carry 
add me on oce Scavv
thanks
scavv
wot is this suppose to mean

There is so much wrong with this.
No offence but if you were "a good adc" and had "crappy supports", surely, SURELY you would have a higher winrate on twitch then 27% for 52 games. That's something like 14 wins out of 52 games...

i just want to say that was when i finshed placements and went to s5 and i sucked cos everyone was so 'good' so i lost alot thats why
and its 32% winrate
